reviews_data.review_text: Great brewery to bring friends from out of town! Good variety of choices for every palate and their food menu was recently revamped.  Super dog friendly and great customer service.

I love this place. Staff are so friendly and know their beer. Love the outside patio and it's a great place to bring your dog. They have big bowls of water for dogs there. The food is yummy too. I recommend the pretzels and sweet potato fries. The beer is so good and great selection!
Fun, good food and drinks
Chillin in the Charlotte cold with the family.  Great atmosphere!

Great brewery venue on Charlotte's South End. Great variety of brews and nice food menu options. Bartenders were friendly and hardworking. Kept things clean and smooth on a busy Saturday night. Loved it!
We stopped in with The Funny Bus Christmas light tour and so enjoyed it! The Florida Seltzer was so good!
Awesome beer and bartenders !! Ordered food, a burger üçî not cheap came with nothing, no fries, no side, no pickle ü•í I mean absolutely nothing, not impressed, not right!!
Good food and great selection on draft

Went here Saturday night around 7. It was very busy but we were served quickly at the bar. We found a seat and our food was delivered pretty quickly. The food was good, staff friendly, and there was ample seating.
Great atmosphere and great servers

Awesome brewery! I had the prickly pear sour and it was DELICIOUS! I'm a big sour beer fan. The pretzels and chicken sandwich were fantastic as well. This was an awesome dog friendly spot to grab some grub, drink some brews, and catch both college football games as well as some World Cup matches. Would definitely come back again
This is my favorite brewery in Charlotte! Keep Pounding.

Well loved Charlotte brewery with expansive inside and outside seating and a lineup of fabulous beers. Some snacks available too. Inside and covered patio has TVs showing sports. Despite the crowds on weekends service isn't slow!
The beer, great staff, great atmosphere.  What more can you say!
Great place with amazing service and plenty of indoor and outdoor seating. Went there to get a coffee and enjoyed the large selection and brewery atmosphere.
Joe G on trivia!!

This place was suggested by our waiter from the pub Ri Ra,  he sent us to the north side but because google walking maps sent us south we landed here. The gentleman behind the counter asked me specific questions regarding ‚Äúmy go to beer flavors‚Äù, and thus came up with the winners in a flight that was quite enjoyable and spot on. Truth be told he comped me an extra because he said he liked me. That is true customer service right there, and that beer was my favorite, took one to go AND bought and awesome button down shirt for my hubby. Long story short , My experience with both locations was positive and for those that may have been apart of my experience will be happy to know that the 2X shirt ended up fitting!!! (My husband wears an xl , be sure to check the fit out before just buying your normal size-) Thanks to the guy with the black hat and the guy checking in the back üëçüëç
Great atmosphere and even greater beer.  They actually had curry ketchup which was super delicious with my French fries.  Going back again today.

This is for the FOOD only, the beer is great! But I don't know how a burger can be both dry AF and greasy? The bacon jam is basically just bacon crumble, it seems like they are relying on that in lieu of any condiment. I had to ask for mayo, ( they have sauces for fries so this was confusing) I got some helmanns packets tossed at me.

almost all their beers are amazing. even if you don't usually enjoy a certain type of beer, it's easy to appreciate the brewing skill that went into them. Jess helped us out with samples that made it difficult to decide as they close early on Thursdays. I'm from out of state and will be back specifically to enjoy myself at this Brewery. 10/10
10/10, you'll have a blast. Shout out to Ashley üíØ

This place was awesome. Tried a handful of their beers, Fruits of Crime, Cucumber Cooler, Power Synapse, & What He's having, all fantastic.  Their chicken sandwich was tremendous, great breading, some unexpected spice and then their burger was phenomenal too. Clearly a high quality beef, seasoned well, and incredibly tasty. Can't wait to go back.
Great beer choices, good location, spacious inside, and an outdoor covered patio. Definitely going back.
Great beer and wings were üëå

This was a good place to hangout, they have nice outdoor seating with roof and plenty of beer options and decent food menu. We went to the place just before their kitchen closing time but not the brewery, we ordered sambal wings which is their garlic pepper sauce and the brat dumplings. We received buffalo wings instead of the sambal wings. I didn't really mind since it was very late but the wings itself were chewy. Dumplings were okay. We also couple of beers psychic dynamite (west coast ipa) beer and it was very good and another one called old world. I think this was a barrel aged ipa and it had a unique taste and I personally wasn't a fan of it.
Fantastic beer and wings! Beer was so good that I almost forgot to take a photo of it for this review lol
Walker is the best!!! Seriously the best bartender I've ever encountered. He was very kind and helpful. :)

Beer was great and the different styles satisfied my party's varied tastes. Food was tasty without any imperfections. Walker was good to us and shared all his beer knowledge and plenty of little samples so we could make educated decisions. If I was a local I'd be a regular.
Staff was very friendly, but not a fan of the beer or the smell of the place. The mixture of coffee and beer being sold inside probably didn't help, but the beer was not great for me.
The beers are great. Liked all that I tried. The Staff is great! A must try for beer lovers!!
Went here thinking they were open fue to their hours posted. They were actually closed and did not open till 12:00 noon one guy was rude and cussed us out
Amazing selection and great location
Nice brewery. Charges for stickers
Awesome vibe with plenty of indoor and outdoor seating. Great beer and the soft pretzels are delish!
Super nice staff and great beers! Really good atmosphere as well.
Its has really good beers. And service is awesome

Wooden Robot Brewery is a great place to grab a drink and chill with your friends. I went for the first time for my friend's 21st and was not dissapointed. The vibe and atmosphere was very nice and they had a wide variety of drinks on tap. I got the Wulong Tang drink which was pretty good. I wish they had ciders but they have a drink for everyone. I enjoyed sitting on the rooftop and enjoying the views of noda with my friends. Highly recommend if you're in the area!
In Charlotte for the first time with my husband. Wooden Robot was 12/10 for coffee and beer!
Beer is phenomenal, and new space is incredible.

Great brewery! The place was huge. It had an outdoor patio as well as plenty of indoor seating. The food selection was great, had lots of beer choices, and the service was fast, friendly, and just made the experience awesome. I would highly recommend this place if you're looking for a place to eat or just hang out.
Busy busy busy but a nice place overall

Go for the beer and stay for the food! The new kitchen at the Southend location is AMAZING. Best fried chicken sandwich ever (move over Chick fil A) and the curry ketchup for the fries is the only way to eat ketchup from here on out.
Great place great beer üç∫
Great OG of the charlotte beer scene. Nice space, good food, and the Good Morning Vietnam is amazing and brewed with local coffee!
Awesome, chill, great brews and food. Dog friendly.
Great beers with a good selection of styles.  Excellent service.  The sandwich we had was good too.  Great location and excellent vibe.  Dog friendly with big buckets of water around.
Fantastic brews, trivia night was packed! The host is hilarious and geared towards a goofy/hip crowd
We sat at the bar and TJ was phenomenal! Brat dumplings were to die for!
Immaculate vibes and great brews
Stopped by for a little bit in the afternoon with the pups. Service was amazing, beer was awesome and the fried cheese curds were simply to die for.
Great variety of beers, Good Morning Vietnam is a must try. Food was fantastic
Amazing! Did you know their beers are brewed in a way that is gluten free-friendly? Incredible! And their burgers - meaty and delicious with some of the best pickles I've ever had. Check it out!

I was and used to be a big supporter of this brewery. They had great beer, vibes and staff. I have several items of merchandise.  After last night my view and fondness for this place have been completely destroyed.  Their managers Joe and Tj are very condescending and defended their bar back who was on the clock for threatening my friend. I would suggest Keaton be fired for how he acted while on the clock at his job. Your place of business is not your own private brewey or a plave to be possive over your girl friend while you work when nobody was hitting on her.  Trust me she wasnt our type....we sat in the public area and wanted to watch duke vs unc...needless to say i will happily give my money to other local brewries who appreciate professionalism and their customers.  I am a busuness owner myself and i expect thing from my employees the same i do myself. So without hesitation.  Treating my buisness like your own and doing as you please would have that employee  gagaga gone!!!  I rekon the bar back feild can be hard to get into and find replacements for.  God Bless.
Good beer
Good beer, will go back!! Looking forward to the kitchen to Open!!
World class brewery in a cool neighborhood!
Best beers in Charlotte!!
Super cool place. Great setup and tasty beverages! Also, a dude was cruising around in an early 90's gold Lexus jamming, "Play That Funky Music White Boy" on blast. It was amazing!
Always a good reason to go to Wooden Robot.
Great place for a local favorite.... Will at the bar is always on point best service

Fantastic beer, locally sourced ingredients that reflect seasonality. The price reflects the quality, but is always worth it. Loooovve their sour IPA. Dog friendly!!  Twisted eats has a great menu selection, but could use more vegetarian options plz! Tasty sriracha edamame
It's all about the vibe..
Lots of gluten reduced beer options for any taste
Great beer! Friendly and efficient staff
Really nice place to have a beer and watch  games, animal friendly so nice.

South end is a funny place. Go there on a random week night and you'll never find a parking spot or an open seat but, go there during a holiday week or during a home Panthers game and you've got the place to yourself. Wooden Robot is absolutely one of my favorite breweries (#2) so I have to know when to plan a visit to maximize my time there. I love that they make a little bit of everything as far as styles go. Their patio is great for dogs and the heaters leave you feeling toasty on a cold day. The food is quick and delicious. Plenty of seating and a large bar top that's accessible from the patio. I could go on and on about this place!  P.s. try to find street parking somewhere around the block.
Good atmosphere
Fun atmosphere and great beer.
Legit beer spot. "Good Morning Vietnam" is definitely amazing. TJ is a hell of a bartender. He recommended the beers & provided great service.
This place was hoppin! Phenomenal playlist! Super cool glassware! And pretty decent beer to boot!
Great atmosphere and nice selection of beer
Best food and beer of any brewery in Charlotte by far
From IPA to Tart Brett they got it all, and the atmosphere
Good beer, super good food and very nice people.
Cheers üçª
Really awesome atmosphere had a great time got to see this place
Great brew with killer beers. Definitely worth a visit. Great staff. Highly recommended!

We arrived at this brewery just in time to get a seat. It was full by 6pm. My husband said all of his beers on his flight were really good and my cider was good as well. We went on a Wednesday and they played a trivia game at 7.

Well taken care very quickly. Great attitude towards customer. Outstanding variety.  You ask for suggestions on what is taste worthing and they are on target. The is place makes you feel welcome. Thank you staff.
Great gameday atmosphere.  Excellent beer selection and suggestions by the staff
Great bar with a good atmosphere and large beer selection. Definitely a good stop to make on a visit to NC
What he's having was worth the trip in itself. Food was good but not to my liking (a bit sweet from the bbq sauce which is the norm down here).
Good brews, good space, good atmosphere. COVID protocols followed by almost all customers.
Great place, love the beer!!
Clea, friendly place with excellent craft beer.

They have a wide array of IPAs and each are well balanced. They are on the hazier side, which is not a bad thing. My favorite beer was Good Morning Vietnam - super tasty! Also, be sure to check out Twisted Eats - great food. The Mac and Cheese Egg roll was super tasty! (Just be sure to let it cool for a moment.) There is a small parking lot directly across the street.
Not a beer drinker.... no other options ‚òπ
TJ was awesome.  we had a great time.  Thanks.
Stopped in after Candlelight concert. Great beers and tasty appetizers
Great ambiance and staff! Just wish they had more options for cider.
Walk straight from the sidewalk to the taps and get a great beer. What's not to love?
Loved their new batch of Hazy IPA!
Good beer, bartender bought me a beerüëçüç∫
Great beer, great food, great staff!
Coffee blonde was to die for! And great service and lots of outdoor seating.

Beer and atmosphere are great. They had seltzer and cider for the wife which was really nice. The 4 stars instead of 5 is because the food is pretty bad. Had Mac n cheese egg rolls, wonton nachos, and fries. The Mac n cheese egg rolls had no cheese in them. I was tempted to ask if they forgot the cheese, but then I saw a few specs holding the noodles together. C'mon you gotta have more cheese on a dish literally meant to have a lot of cheese. The fries were unfortunately bland despite looking really good. The nachos were good, but again needed more cheese and all the toppings were only on the top chips. Got half way through and it was just plain chips.
My man Joe got me covered. Super nice. Has good beer suggestions and makes us feel welcomed.
A Great place to lounge and have a beer or 3... been going here for years and notice the growth. Wooden Robot is well on its way to becoming a name in every household.
They have trivia on Tuesdays starting at 7. Had a young professional crowd and an older crowd mix. Great for everyone. Dog friendly. They serve food as well.
Good beers easy.
Love the beers and atmosphere
These folks were super nice. The beer was great! Wonderful experience at Wooden Robot.
Great selection of draft beers, especially multiple IPA choices. Dog friendly. Food not too bad. Great atmosphere and area.
Checked it out during a short visit. Loved the Good Morning Vietnam. Would have loved to try out the foods offered were I not already full.
Beer is good, nice staff, chill atmosphere
Seriously you can never go wrong with a place like this. Have a great atmosphere and a fantastic variety!

the unnecessarily rude comments from the staff almost had me in tears today. There is no need to ever comment on a customer's ‚Äúface‚Äù or assume their reaction. Their comments on my private conversation were inappropriate. Will not be returning again and would not recommend.

Staff is rude and unnecessary. They spend more time commenting on private conversations than distinguishing themselves as an actual employee. Once they can start making better beer and food then they can start acting like they are worth anything. Otherwise go to your 7-Eleven and get a Miller it's the same thing.
Love this place
Good beer!
Great atmosphere! Love the option for outside seating.
Really impressed with each draft highly recommend stoping.

Dog-friendly and very nice/attentive staff. We felt very safe here as they had great COVID measures in place. The Twisted Eats stall was delicious and the beers were tasty. Definitely our new go-to place!

One of my favorite breweries in Charlotte. The Good Morning Vietnam is absolutely amazing. They have a ton of seating, inside and outside. The outside patio is covered, which makes it easily enjoyed in almost all weather.
Dan, T.J, and Nick were absolutely wonderful. Great service, always great beer, and a fun establishment to be in. Please visit!
Great place to relax, inside or on the porch. Amazing variety of beers.

Awesome brewery, a friend and I hung out here for a few hours and really enjoyed it. Cool atmosphere and killer beer. My favorite was a Russian Imperial Stout called Godless Killing Machine. Keep up the good work!
Co-working at Recess
Very nice freindly atmosphere. The beer and food were delicious. I would definitely go back.
Two words: beer cheese. Try it. These pretzel bites and beer cheese paired perfectly with our Strata Caster IPA's üòç
Love this place! Favorite brewery that I've been to in Charlotte. Awesome environment and great vibes.

Wooden Robot has been one of my favorite places to go hang out in the past year. They're really great about making sure people are masked when not at their table. The outdoor seating is great while being covered and heated. Quality beer.
Mmmmmmm...
Always great beer and service!

Awesome place with lots of indoor and outdoor seating. Good brews and nice staff.  The indoor area is large with seating spread out enough. The outdoor seating has a covered patio with lots of tables, heaters and TVs. Good for all seasons.  Great job across all areas.
Always have great new beers on tap!
Food was well seasoned. Unique menu compared to other brewery locations. High top tables. Nice outside space. Dog friendly.
Very polite and very kind, we installed gas water heater

Best staff and beer in Charlotte. Throughout the pandemic they have taken extreme care to keep their guests and staff safe and their space clean and friendly. I've never met a Wooden Robot beer I didn't like, and the service is unmatched. Give them a visit, wear your mask, and tip your beertender! They deserve it.

Was at the bar for about 1.5 hours and enjoyed it until It was time to leave. Went to close out my tab and grab a crowler. It was crowded so I waited for about 10 minutes(which I didn't mind) Got to the bar and the manager came over to help. He was extremely aggressive when asking what I needed. I asked for my bill and to get a crowler. He yelled that they don't do crowlers inside and to go outside even though I'd been waiting. I went outside to stand at the window and he came back yelling again that I was at the wrong window. I finally got someone besides him and they were pleasant to deal with.  Great beer but whomever the manager is(shaved or short hair and beard) has some anger issues and should just stay away from customers and let the staff handle things.
One of the best breweries in Charlotte.
Delicious beer. Fun atmosphere.
Great service, good beer, dog friendly.
Super dog friendly, great beer, delicious food! The peach cobbler and blackberry sours are tart (in the best way) and good morning vietnam is always a solid go-to. Very chill atmosphere.
Nice selection of home brews at very reasonable prices...food was decent too.
Great beer and vibes in a nice building and outdoor space.
Great beer and a fantastic staff! Absolutely recommend this brewery if you're in the area. The Pretty Witty and Good Morning Vietnam are fantastic beers.
The beer is a 10/10 the music is a 10/10 the atmosphere is 10/10 no doubt best beer in charolette
Great service, great atmosphere, great food, and especially great beer.  I definitely recommend
Clean, fresh, great staff. Thank you
Best beer, service, atmosphere... the best üíõüçª
Best beers in Charlotte. Great atmosphere and and bartenders.
Excellent brewery
This place is an amazing experience
Great patio friendly staff and food by Twisted Eats. Oh and great beers to go with it. The playlist was well curated. Dog friendly...
Perfect place to enjoy a beer...inside or outside. They also have dining options. I love that it's also within walking distance to other breweries and restaurants
Awesome beer. Delicious steak sammie.
Nice place. They have good beer, good food and a nice staff. What more could you want.
Great atmosphere,  great craft beer!!  Indoor and outdoor seating.  Extremely dog friendly,  inside and outside.  Good bar food!!!
Get the Good Morning Vietnam! Best beer in Charlotte. Both locations are amazing!
Excellent selection of beers. Good, reasonably priced food options. Great atmosphere (including spacious outdoor patio). Friendly, knowledgeable staff.
Good beer, nice atmosphere. Lots of dogs outside. Soccer games on TV.
One of the best breweries I have been to in awhile. Great beer and atmosphere. I will definitely be coming back.
What a cool place! I have been wanting to visit for a while! Tonight was just what I needed! They had a great crowd and a cool vibe! The beer and food was great!
Came for the beer, stayed for some food too. This place rocks!
Great spot to have a few beers with friends. Nice variety of beers and solid food selection too. Laid back atmosphere with open seating, TVs, and patio make this a perfect weekend afternoon spot.
Great beer and fantastic food. Mac and cheese egg rolls were outrageous.
Best beer in Charlotte hands down. Staff is very friendly and knowledgeable too.

Its a good place to wait for a friend right off the train.  On the trendy and 20's side.  Tried Sweet Tator and Aww Fudge.  Both were very sweet.  Bartender was nice and quick. Price is pretty standard for breweries.
Nice place, good drinks, informative bartenders, and space outside to smoke a cigar with their drinks!
Very informative when we had questions. All of the beers were good, and there was a nice selection. The wooden atmosphere was fitting.
Good selection of beers and there are always a few that I really like.  The on-site kitchen also has really good bar food.

Great atmosphere! Cool food choices, but heavy on the IPA beer selection. This is the only reason I didn't give 5 stars. I got a flight which is 5 beers and could only pick four that didn't sound "wheaty". The So Exotic was great!
Cool brewery. Their beer is good.
Food is delicious and service is good. They let you try beers and then choose what you like.
Great beer and quality food, but I wish they had some cheaper food options.
What a great find. Great selection of beers, including some quirky ones but really good IPAs. Tasty food to go with the beer too.
Favorite brewery in Charlotte. The Good Morning Vietnam is amazing. Love the atmosphere here.

GLUTEN FREE ALERT!!!  This place is in the top ranks my best of list.  Located in the bustling, walk-able bar hoppy South End in Charlotte.  Expect to see quite the crowd here.  It is a great place with great beer options.  You will see art on the wall.  You will find great customer service.  I am forced to be gluten free and the beer here is good.  It made me remember the days when I could actually drink real beer.  This caters towards a college graduate in their first job crowd.  Expect to find people from all over the country who just landed their first grown up job in Charlotte.  Lots of young professionals.  You will have conversations and meet new people if you go here.
Best sours in town! The food is amazing too- love this place.
Great lively place with great food.
Friendly staff and good prices

Started coming here more frequently since the newest food installment but now I've fallen in love with the Wooden Robot for it's delicious brews (Good Morning Vietnam is a must try) and the excellent atmosphere. Input from local artists make the interior really pop and the spread out floor plan help keep you from feeling trapped in during busy hours like smaller local breweries.
What Craft beer is all about, your must visit brewery in Charlotte. Place is amazing and continues to grow
Great selection of beers and very cool atmosphere.
Solid brewpub with a great atmosphere

4 stars for the beer, maybe 2 stars for the food. We enjoy the beer and wanted to try the food because of the great reviews. Ordered the duck quesadilla with fries, waited, waited,  and waited some more. The kitchen didn't appear to be particularly busy. Finally checked on our food after multiple people who ordered after us got their food. Ours was waiting and the cashier said that it had been waiting for fries, which must have meant that they were waiting for the fries to cool down because they were barely room temperature. The quesadilla had a little warmth, so we kept that and I took the fries back. The man at the counter gave me more fries, but they were from a bowl sitting on the kitchen counter and were a little warmer, but not very good. Fries need to be served fresh, especially when you're not busy. Very disappointing. Maybe it was a bad day in the kitchen, but they didn't seem to care very much about what they were sending out. We'll probably return for the beer, but no second chance for the food. There are lots of other places to eat in Charlotte.

I have been here both times I visited Charlotte. Definitely going to make sure its a stop the next time I am in the area. Great location and atmosphere, and the beer is delicious. I love the variety of beers available, flights are definitely the way to go if you wanna try them all!

Stopped in here on a Thursday evening, decent amount of people but still room at the bar. Had the pool pounder and the raspberry swirl it, both were awesome! Honestly better then I thought. Also ordered some food which was also really good. Definitely suggest while in Charlotte.
One of my favorite breweries in Charlotte. Great atmosphere, great brews.
Good brewery with decent beers on tap. Pretzels and beer cheese was good.

This place is awesome. Great options for beers and incredible food from the Twisted Eats window. This is definitely on my list to visit again. I'm not from the area so whenever I visit I try out new places. This is by far my favorite. We had the Cuban and the Chicken sandwich with fries. We had iced coffee vanilla, the double IPA, and the Resilience. All very good.  *Ipdates: Edited typos.
Best beer in town.. beertenders are awesome, and attentive.  Food isn't bad either, sunday brunch menu is a plus... great Sours, and What He's Having can challenge any IPA in town..

I have always been loyal to the OG brewery establishments in Charlotte, but you gotta give props when they are due. From brewing to cooking, these guys are knocking it out of the park with flavors galore. The faster they can bottle/can their offerings, the more market share they will be able to go after.

The great thing about Robot is that they partnered with a food genius.  Twisted Eats Rocks the house with innovative flavors and fun food.  We were first to try a new special‚Äî tuna nachos....   super good.  Fried chips, sushi tuna, light aioli, cabbage... not your father's cheese nachos... by a country mile.  See photo.  Keep it up awesome dudes!
Great beers!  Food service inside is super tasty as well.  Just wished I'd had more room in my bags to take some beer home with me (visiting from Kansas City for work).
Awesome beer, food and staff! Great spot.
The best brewery in Charlotte
Great food & food service
Good funky beer
great spot, staff was nice and the place is awesome
Great place to bring dogs and good beer. Alot of sour beers if you like them
Good beer
Great atmosphere and beer üçª!

Easily one of my favorite breweries in all of Charlotte. Location is phenomenal, the beer is great, the back porch area is awesome, and you can bring the dog along if you stay outside. I haven't tried the food yet but have heard great things. If it is your first time to Charlotte, or even if you are a local, this place should be on your list.

Third time going to Wooden robot, second time getting food. Loving the BBQ Mac and Cheese egg rolls and who's not to love their spin on the Pretzel Bites with beer cheese. The beer selection is greatly improved as on my first trip I felt that everything on tap that was good wasn't theirs. They make a great sour beer line and I'd recommend thicket as thieves as one of the better sours around. The service has also gotten better from the first two times, and I didn't feel as ignored by bar staff, which is an honest criticism other reviewers have made. Only thing keeping me from a five star is consistency of that service, what's great now seems to come and go based on my first two trips.
great food and a great atmosphere!

Excellent beer selection especially for those that like Belgian inspired American ales. Best saison, sour, and farmhouse ale selection in Charlotte.  The patio(s) are simple but very nice. Food is mostly midscale American and bar fare; looked great, but I didn't try any today  Sun and fun, gogogogo
They have a bunch of hoppy beers. Love the imperial stout. They have a few good food options. Gets crowded on the weekends. Fun place to hangout in the sun.
Great beer options, phenomenal service, super friendly staff! Such a great space all around!
Excellent beer selection... 5 IPAs on tap and they were all good!  Stout and sour were also excellent.
Makes me feel younger...:)))

A group of us walked in on a Saturday night.  It was packed full of trendy young people.  The very young plastic bartender was a bit overwhelmed but also fairly rude.  Her "I don't give a sh.t factor" seemed to be on full display.  So it was your typical "what do you want?"  Thank God I paid in cash because I am not sure she could poor beers and remember to run a card within a 5 minute span.  We paid way too much for a round of beers that tasted like tree bark.  Then we sat down for a surprise party...there were noise makers and such at a table in the back.  We began to blow the noise makers and a kid no older than 22 told us to quit making noise in a bar full of narcissists trying to out-selfy each other.  Apparently having a surprise party for an old friend was putting a bad vibe for the plastic people in this establishment.  So we tried to wash down the tree bark ale before it got warm and we left approximately 30 minutes after arrial.  Let's just say...I won't be back.  The only reason why I gave this 3 stars is because small businesses like this one make a difference in the community.  If you want to impress your young plastic date...take her here.  She will be impressed.  If you want a good time.. good tunes...good food...good beers...good vibes...not as many fake people...go to Macs on south.

Spent the whole day traveling from California to Charlotte for a trade show. Decided to try the Wooden Robot. Big mistake. We sat at our table for over ten minutes while the female and male bartender we behind the bar talking and not pouring drinks. They were literally looking right at us and pretended like we were not there. The sad part was that it was raining  and not at all busy. We were also starving and the menu looked OK but it stated we had to go outside in the rain to order from a food truck and would be paged when our food was ready. Lame! Ended up going to a place called Manchester 1812 down the street. Staff was great, food was great! We were a party of ten and our bill came out to $ 500 with a tip.

I went to this place last week and it was definitely a really good experience. We had a get together and chose this place. We were 15 people in all and each one of us was paid attention by the staff. This was probably the best part of visiting this place. The food was also delicious and drinks were good as well. The most impressive thing about this place was the treatment by the staff. Thankyou Wooden Robot Brewery for such a wonderful experience.

First time in here and it was a great experience!  I love the ambiance and vibe and openness of the space. It's communal seating in the back, which I personally enjoy because you can always start up convos w/fellow beer enthusiasts and as they say "strangers are just friends you haven't met yet".  They were packed the Friday night I went, but the bartenders were quick and attentive and they seemed to go out of their way to make sure anyone standing at the bar had been helped.  I did the sampler flight of 5 beers. They give decent pours and you can choose any of their beer offerings. I liked that they had a variety of styles and I also liked that they didn't up charge you for the boozier/high abv beers. Needless to say, my flight choices were the big abv beers and they were all delicious! I had had a few of their staples at various beer bars and restaurants in town, but it was nice to see some of the "only at the brewery" options.  Will definitely be back to see what's new on tap!
Pretty good. Very busy, and good beers

My favorite brewery in Charlotte, period.  Most diverse selection of flavors that can take you way off the beaten beer path. The taproom is almost always packed full of people, but the bar keeps up and always has a clean glass waiting for your next brew.  If you order the same beer twice in a row, you're making a mistake.  If you like traditional flavors, they have them.  If you want to try some more "mad science experiments", you're looking in the right place too.
Great selection of beers and an awesome taproom. Great place to grab a flight and try some great craft beer.
Great beer but the view is not as good as other bars in the area and service can take long
Who doesn't love a Robot named Woody?!? Got to try the Good Morning Vietnam. :-)
Recommended to me by a friend. Gave it a shot when I visited Charlotte and absolutely loved. Highly recommend.
Love this place! Good Morning Vietnam and Robotico are my top favorite beers of all time. Celebrated a surprise birthday here and it was well worth it!

DO NOT ORDER FOOD FROM HERE!!!!!!!!  Good atmosphere with alot of special beers you cant get anywhere but there. The 2 stars come in due to the extreamly over priced food. I ordered the wings. 8 wings with fries  for around $15. The wings had the same consistency that of frozen microwaved " Bargain" wings, the fries were dressed very well and pleasing to the eye, but had absolutly no flavor. My wife got the flatbread (as suggested to be the best thing on the menu by the server) the flatbread had very little flavor with nearly no sauce, cheese, or toppings. We also ordered the pretzels witch had the same consistency as old chewing gum and no flavor this came with cheese but as you could guess had very little flavor.  The wooden Robot needs to stick to beer and leave the way over priced food to the many other breweries that know what they are doing.

Amazing beer selection, so many great options. Relaxed setting, lots of people though on a Saturday afternoon. The bartenders were on top of it and seemed to be taking great care of everyone. Food was awesome too.

I really love this brewery. All of the beers are Gluten Free. If you have a problem, like I with Gluten. This is the place to be. They also have a small kitchen inside at the right side. If you need any of the sandwiches to be GF. They will make three small tacos in Corn tortillas. All sandwiches come with your pick of fries  with parmesan and truffle oill or, spicy edamames.
Pretty impressed with the beer selection at this brewery but have to say what's he's having is my favorite beer and I love the name

Best brewery in Charlotte and the food is delicious!  Good Morning Vietnam is my absolute favorite beer! . Within distance of Bland station and the atmosphere is very relaxed.  They have two great patios and two bars from which to order!  Highly recommend!

One of the best breweries in Charlotte. Wonderful tap rotation and creativity in their beers. The Good Morning Vietnam is my favorite beer in the Charlotte area. The first brewery I recommend people to when they visit the city
Visited with friends while in Charlotte. Excellent and interesting food and good beer - plus for having several cider options on draft too!
Best brewery in charlotte
Lotsa choices great atmosphere
Awesome place
Beer selection is to DIE for. They also have tasty food.
Nice place with a good vibe. Decent food too.
Good food. Good beer.
Great environment
Great beer, friendly service, and just an overall fun atmosphere!
Great beer. If they have the Triple IPA try it. One if the better beers I've had this year.
Not the largest selection of beer but good food, nice atmosphere. I enjoyed it.
Great beer and great scenery

Parking is tough with a combination of street parking and pay kiosks. Still, the place was pretty packed at 2:30pm on a Saturday. Nice amount of tables and two bars with an eclectic vibe. Nice selection on tap and their brews are very good. No waiters her so you have to visit the bars. We ordered the bosshog mac&cheese egg roll from Twisted Eats and was not a fan. It was very greasy and wasn't very tasty. The fries were terrific but no ketchup available. They used some light sauce. I did see other items coming from the kitchen that looked good. Overall I figure a good hangout for locals within walking distance.
Love the food here.
Good IPA's
beer. give it to me. now.
Great beer, great service. Will definitely go back
Great atmosphere, and good morning Vietnam is the best beer ever! Favorite brewery by far!
Great place to hang out and have some beers. The food from Twisted Eats was really good too. Will definitely visit again the next time I am in CLT.

My wife and I had a really great time here. Ross was awesome! He is well versed in everything they have and helped us select some of our new favs! The smoked wings from Twisted Eats are a must try with the boozy bbq sauce! We will definitely be returning.
Wonderful ipa and food.
I absolutely loved this place. Incredible beer, carryout crowlers, and helpful staff

Really wanted to like this place, heard very good things about it. But as far as my opinion goes - both beer and service can be summed up in 6 letters each - ‚Äúok beer‚Äù and ‚Äúrude af‚Äù. Not exactly sure what warranted the latter, maybe the fact that someone was having a bad hurricane induced day, who knows. But it was off putting right from the start and I couldn't drink my beer fast enough to get out of there. I added 1 star for the other bartender being nice and also took a few crowlers home with me so that the beer (the one I originally intended to enjoy inside) can be given another chance. Weird, uncomfortable and not welcoming overall. Also, the whole ‚Äúnot filling up other growlers‚Äù trend didn't last long even in NorCal, so let's see how long it lasts here, with a ton of friendly breweries literally right around the corner  EDIT: beer is actually pretty descent
Always a fun time awesome food. And The beer no other like it... My new favorite spot.
Great local Charlotte hangout to try out some great local IPA. This is a popular spot for locals and visitors.

Very sweet spot, I am upping my beer game for October - came here for the first time. Beautiful weather we sat at the nice picnic style tables outside. My blonde ale choice, Good Morning Vietnam, excellent. My snack, I could not resist the bosshog mac & cheese eggroll. How creative I absolutely adored my visit here.
Good beer and food. Loud but fun
Nice people. Quick service
This place is awesome! Love their beers and they have quite an extensive menu as well. Try the tempura cauliflower, it's to die for!

Beer is consistently good but my god, the guys behind the bar are ALWAYS in a really bad mood. On three separate occasions I've gotten an attitude for just ordering a beer. I don't write too many reviews, but given the frequency of this issue, I wanted to say something.  Would rather drink at the brass tap next door or any of the other 900 breweries in charlotte to avoid Robot's moody bartenders.
Stood at the main bar for 15 minutes without anyone offering to pour me a beer while twenty others received their beers. Not good customer service

Its a small place and has become very popular over the last year so it's normally very crowded inside. The beer is good and the food from Twisted Eats never disappoints. My go to beer here is the "What He's Having", its a citrus IPA. There's also the What She's Having which is the double IPA version.
Good food and all of their beers were really good. Great atmosphere. Check it out!
Great beer and friendly staff!
Nice brewery. Get the taster.  Good Morning Vietnam is a very unique experience, a lightly colored beer that looks almost like an alert but has hints of a coffee stout.
Really cool place. Try the "Good Morning Vietnam" it is super smooth.
Must try the Good Morning Vietnam
I've been to quite a few breweries with flavored beers,  and they by far do out the best.  Low keu atnosphere with great service and a good variety.

Be warned - if you got an accent you're considered drunk and not served. Hope you're going to enjoy the unwelcoming vibe here. The place actually looks nice but don't talk to the servers. They are b.u.t....... holes... big time
Amazing beers, great atmosphere and friendly bartenders.  Must visit when in Charlotte.
I have no idea how someone could go here and not enjoy themselves. Awesome food, even better beer, and the some of the best service in Charlotte. Can't wait to come back!
Delicious beer, outside seating and cool food next door. A+!
I love this place
Good beer, good food, great atmosphere!
Great beers, chill atmosphere.
Great beers. Nice vibe going.

We come to Wooden Robot on occasion and LOVE the Good Morning Vietnam...Food...ick ick ick First...the Mac and cheese egg rolls...completely NOT what the menu says it is...had to point it out to the server. There is NO cheese! None! Read the menu...server even said they have the wrong description. Terrible. Bacon bites...disgusting!! Like dog food. Zero flavor. Dipped in raw flour, unseasoned. Tastes like raw fried flour...tough...gross. Grilled cheese...the cheese is unevenly distributed on the bread...so every bite tastes like a different sandwich. Not blended well at all.  Last time I came, I got the Chinatown chicken salad and it was missing all the ingredients. No edamae no crispy noodles.  Please work on matching your menu to what you serve and season your food! Hope it improves. Very disappointing. :-(
Very cool place....beer is top notch

Great variety of beers!! Try the Good morning Vietnam!! (one of my favorites) and don't forget to ask something from the food menu, they have great options!. The atmosphere is great! Just wish they have more patio space.
The beers were a little pricey, but admittedly, amazing. Good atmosphere, with a humble outdoor space. Again; great beer. A must see brewery in Charlotte.

This was one of my favorite stops in Charlotte! The beer was delicious and the staff were very friendly. I would definitely recommend this brewery. (My favorite was Robotico, but I've been drinking nothing but Modelo all summer!)
Loved it, great selection of beers and well laid out spaces!!
Great service, cool place and really tasty beer and food!ü§≥üëå
Solid beers all the way around! Love this place! I may be slightly biased due to the Good Morning Vietnam though...
Always Fun!!!

Lots of great beers on draft and an extensive food menu with bar food. Great atmosphere, nice open spaces inside and umbrellas on the patio to combat the summer sun. Friendly workers and fast service. We love coming here. We were waiting for Futo Buta across the street (also good - worth the wait) and Wooden Robot is our go-to for chilling and having a nice drink. I got the Celebrating Freedom Pilsner and my wife got A Sour Darkly. Both very good. Our friend got What I'm Having, which she'd had before and enjoyed.

Food was delicious. Watress was really nice and her recommendations we're great! Unfortunately bad experience with bartender who obviously didnt be there and seemed annoyed. Just trying to drink and eat peacefully on a beautiful Sunday afternoon.
Amazing!! Also beer is gf
Good beer... Actually, really good beer... But $7.60 for a pint?  Yikes!  Most expensive brewery in Charlotte.

The beers at Wooden Robot are awesome! The restaurant at Wooden Robot is actually a separate entity called Kre8 GastroPub. They will take your order at the table and bring it to you.  As for the beer, you have to order it at the bar, there's no table service.  Kre8's food is sooo good! I'm not sure what the ambiance is at night but during the day Wooden Robot is kid friendly.
Great Sour Beer in Charlotte!
The best place to experience a beer!
Nothing much to say here other that Bombasaurus Rex beers and doggos. Highly recommended.

Wooden Robot itself is a great stop for anyone wanting to try some good beer. One of the best in Charlotte. Especially their farmhouse ale as a slightly sweeter Yuengling.  The real gem here though is their arrangement with Kre8. Chef Rob and his team make the best food we've had in Charlotte.  I've eaten a lot of wings in my time but these were the best wings I've had in my life. Everything else was fantastic as well; can't go wrong with any food order here.

Visited Wooden Robot as part of a Charlotte Brewery Tour. The beers were amazing. I ended up getting a growler of the Good Morning Vietnam beer and everything I tasted, including the sours was great. The only down side was the service. Overall the staff behind the bar was rude and they seemed very annoyed to have to serve us.
Good morning Vietnam....a delicious blend of coffee and vanilla!
One of my favorite breweries in Charlotte based on the beer itself. Great variety. Recently expanded the bar areas so not so tight anymore.
Good beer. Velvet evolver was great
Good beer. Great service.  More seating would be nice. But limited seating is attributed to how great of a place this is.
Great beer, loved the Robotico and Good Morning Vietnam!

Review for Kre8 Gastropub (restaurant inside) part of Wooden Robot):  I was really looking forward to trying out this new concept after reading a lot about it leading up to the opening.  I was honestly a little disappointed. There food was good, but not as good as I was expecting it to be. I got the chicken sandwich and fried cauliflower. The chicken sandwich was just ok. It was a little dry and kind of lacked flavor. The fried cauliflower was pretty good, but nothing that special. Two people at my table got the grilled cheese and thought it was just ok. They said it wasn't cheesy enough. The one thing that really stood out were the brussels sprouts. They were some of the best I've had.  While the restaurant does have its own space, they will also serve you the full menu from the brewery which is really nice.  If I was hungry while at the brewery, I would get food again, but I probably wouldn't go out of my way to come to the restaurant.
Some of the best sours I have had in a while. 124 Conch was outstanding.
Awesome place
Fantastic beers
Garbage beer, the worst service in all Charlotte breweries. Better off going to Bulldog or Pop the Top.
Best brewery in Charlotte!
Nice people. Awesome brewery.
Great beer selection, good atmosphere, and awesome view of the city!
Beer and food were excellent, service is top notch, cool atmosphere. Great place
Great brewery !
Love the good morning vietnam
